name: Int'l Conference on Solar Photovoltaic Technology
content: Int'l Conference on Solar Photovoltaic Technology (CSPT 2019) Conference Date: December 6-8, 2019 Conference Venue: Sanya, China Website: http://www.deconf.org/conference/CSPT2019/ Online Registration System: http://www.deconf.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1185 Email: workshop12@163.com Int'l Conference on Solar Photovoltaic Technology (CSPT 2019) will be held from December 6-8, 2019 in Sanya, China. This conference will cover issues on High efficiency photovoltaic cells, Photovoltaic systems, Photovoltaic technology, Solar Cell Materials and Structures, Solar energy and energy systems, etc. CSPT 2019 dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods. If you wish to serve the conference as an invited speaker, please send email to us with your CV. We'll contact with you asap.
